Speaking on the teaching, not against the teaching
Four qualities of well-spoken words [sn8: Second is speaking on the teaching, not against it
Third is speaking pleasantly, not unpleasantly
Fourth is speaking truthfully, not falsely
Words that do not hurt oneself or others
Words that are pleasing and bring nothing bad to others
Words spoken by the Buddha for realizing the sanctuary, extinguishment, and making an end of suffering
